00036 RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::MeshViewer(QWidget* parent)
00037   :QWidget(parent){
00038   setMinimumSize(150, 150);
00039 
00040   mRenderWindow=NULL;
00041   mSceneManager=Ogre::Root::getSingleton().getSceneManager("MeshViewerView");
00042   mCamera=mSceneManager->getCamera("MeshViewerCam");
00043 
00044   mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(100,100,0));
00045   mCamera->lookAt(Vector3(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
00046 
00047 
00048 }

00053 RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::~MeshViewer(){
00054 
00055 }

00060 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::setupView(){
00061   if(mRenderWindow)
00062     return;
00063 
00064   NameValuePairList params;
00065 
00066 #if !defined(Q_WS_WIN)
00067   QWidget *q_parent = dynamic_cast <QWidget *> (parent());
00068   QX11Info xInfo = x11Info();
00069 
00070   params["parentWindowHandle"] = Ogre::StringConverter::
00071     toString ((unsigned long)xInfo.display()) +
00072     ":" + Ogre::StringConverter::toString ((unsigned int)xInfo.screen()) +
00073     ":" + Ogre::StringConverter::toString ((unsigned long)q_parent->winId());
00074 
00075 #else
00076   params["externalWindowHandle"] = Ogre::StringConverter::
00077     toString((size_t)(HWND)winId());
00078 #endif
00079 
00080   LOGI("Creating MeshViewer render window");
00081   LOGCATS("width='");
00082   LOGCATI(width());
00083   LOGCATS("' height='");
00084   LOGCATI(height());
00085   LOGCATS("'");
00086   LOGCAT();
00087 
00088   mRenderWindow = Ogre::Root::getSingleton()
00089     .createRenderWindow("MeshView", width(), height(), true, &params);
00090 
00091 
00092   // Setup the Camera, viewport...
00093   LOGI("Creating MeshViewer viewport");
00094   mVp=mRenderWindow->addViewport(mCamera);
00095   mVp->setBackgroundColour(ColourValue(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f, 1));
00096 
00097 #if !defined(Q_WS_WIN) // Linux
00098   WId window_id;
00099   mRenderWindow->getCustomAttribute("GLXWINDOW", &window_id);
00100   
00101   // Take over the ogre created window.
00102   QWidget::create(window_id);
00103   
00104   LOGI("Repositionning MeshViewer render window");
00105   LOGCATS("x='");
00106   LOGCATI(x());
00107   LOGCATS("' y='");
00108   LOGCATI(y());
00109   LOGCATS("'");
00110   LOGCAT();
00111   mRenderWindow->reposition(x(),y());
00112 #endif
00113 
00114   startTimer(5);
00115 
00116 }
00117 
00123 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* evt){
00124   Q_UNUSED(evt);
00125   setupView();
00126 
00127   if (mRenderWindow != NULL){
00128 #if !defined(Q_WS_WIN) // Linux
00129     mRenderWindow->resize (width(), height());
00130 #endif
00131     mRenderWindow->windowMovedOrResized();
00132     mCamera->setAspectRatio(Ogre::Real(mVp->getActualWidth()) 
00133                             / Ogre::Real(mVp->getActualHeight()));
00134   }
00135 
00136 }
00137 
00143 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::timerEvent(QTimerEvent* evt){
00144   Q_UNUSED(evt);
00145   update();
00146   //  updateAnim();
00147 }
00148 
00154 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* evt){
00155   Q_UNUSED(evt);
00156   if(mRenderWindow == NULL)
00157     setupView();
00158   
00159   update();
00160 }
00161 
00168 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::update(){
00169   if(mRenderWindow != NULL){
00170     Ogre::Root::getSingleton()._fireFrameStarted();
00171     mRenderWindow->update();
00172 
00173     updateStats();
00174     Ogre::Root::getSingleton()._fireFrameEnded();
00175   }
00176 }
00177 
00183 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::addMesh(const char* name){
00184   if (!mRenderWindow)
00185     setupView();
00186 
00187   LOGI("Adding a mesh");
00188   LOGCATS("Mesh filename :");
00189   LOGCATS(name);
00190   LOGCAT();
00191 
00192   // Mesh
00193   Ogre::Entity *ent = mSceneManager->createEntity( "Essai", name );
00194   ent->setCastShadows( true );
00195   Ogre::SceneNode* sn=mSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()
00196     ->createChildSceneNode( Vector3( 0, 0, 0 ) );
00197 
00198   //  sn->setOrientation(rw, rx, ry, rz);
00199   sn->attachObject( ent );
00200 
00201   mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(800,200,1200));
00202   //  mCamera->lookAt( 0.0f ,0.0f ,0.0f );
00203 }
00204 
00210 void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewer::updateStats(){
00211   try{
00212     const RenderTarget::FrameStats& stats = mRenderWindow->getStatistics();
00213     int FPS = (int)stats.lastFPS;
00214     int triangles = stats.triangleCount;
00215 
00216     emit updateFpsCount(FPS);
00217     emit updateTriCount(triangles);
00218   }
00219   catch(...){}
00220 }
